game.name: The World's Egg - For Those Who Dream
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Mari lives an ordinary life with her best friend, Kotone, in an ordinary town. Suddenly, their peaceful lives are shattered when they're attacked by monsters from another world.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Mari lives an ordinary life with her best friend, Kotone, in an ordinary town. Suddenly, their peaceful lives are shattered when they're attacked by monsters from another world.
